document.full_text: the boston bruins inched closer to their first stanley cup finals in more than 20 years after a 3-1 victory over the tampa bay lightning on monday put them one win away from clinching the eastern conference title.
document.title: bruins on brink of stanley cup finals with game 5
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins inched closer to their first stanley cup finals in more than 20 years after a 3-1 victory over the tampa bay lightning on monday put them one win away from clinching the eastern conference title.
